mapper.select: SELECT d.department_name AS 'departmentName', sum( CASE WHEN s.sex = '男' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'numberOfMales', sum( CASE WHEN s.sex = '女' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'numberOfFemales' FROM student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id GROUP BY s.department_id, d.department_name;

SELECT s.id AS 'id', s.student_id AS 'studentId', s.grade AS 'studentGrade', s.clazz AS 'studentClazz', s.sex AS 'studentSex', s.`name` AS 'studentName', s.age AS 'studentAge', s.mobile AS 'studentMobile', s.address AS 'studentAddress', d.department_name AS 'departmentName', m.major_name AS 'majorName' FROM student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id LEFT JOIN major m ON s.major_id = m.major_id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId};
